markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cold Iron Blanch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=861)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Precious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=131" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 104</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Member of the Pathfinder Society.

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You can pour a vial of this dark liquid onto one melee weapon, one thrown weapon, or 10 pieces of ammunition. When used on a melee or thrown weapon, rather than ammunition, the blanch lasts for the listed duration or 10 successful Strikes, whichever comes first. When you use it on ammunition, the blanch is expended on a given piece of ammunition after firing it, whether it hits or not. A cold iron blanch contains small amounts of [alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75), so it must be used all at once; an opened vial ignites to melt the cold iron onto the weapon and is quickly consumed. The weapon or ammunition counts as [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=272) instead of its normal precious material (such as silver) for any physical damage it deals, if applicable.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Cold Iron Blanch (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 104</row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The blanch provides low-grade cold iron, so you can use it on a magic weapon up to 8th level, or ammunition for such a weapon. It lasts for 1 minute.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Cold Iron Blanch (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 104</row>

**Price** 140 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The blanch provides standard-grade cold iron, so you can use it on a magic weapon up to 15th level, or ammunition for such a weapon. It lasts for 10 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
Cold Iron Blanch (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 104</row>

**Price** 1,700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The blanch provides high-grade cold iron, so you can use it with any magic weapon. It lasts for one hour.
name: Cold Iron Blanch (Moderate)
